prompts: Create a sleek water-type Pokemon that glides through the ocean with ease and grace.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a manta ray, with unique patterns and soft colors.
Design a flying aquatic Pokemon with a gentle personality and smooth, flowing movements.
Give me a Pokemon that has a body shape similar to a winged creature, perfect for underwater currents.
Generate a calm and friendly Pokemon that thrives in oceanic environments and loves to socialize.
Show me a Pokemon that can soar through the water like a bird in the sky, with beautiful colors.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea and has a playful nature.
